reviewText: My mistake. I thought I was ordering the book.

What a wonderful way to be 'in the know' on one's home turf, in one's personal social life, as well as for those moments that arise all around the world.  Thank you, Naomi Poulson!

I could go on and on... but watch her DVD and be delighted as well as informed.

Thank heavens someone has produced something so easily understood as well as so easy to implement!
